Abstract client class to connect to the API server.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.AbstractClient.API_USERNAME
member.summary: The API username to be used.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.AbstractClient.API_VERSION
member.summary: The API version to be used.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.AbstractClient.apiKey
member.summary: The provided Twizo API key.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.AbstractClient.apiHost
member.summary: The provided Twizo host.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.AbstractClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The Twizo host of your choice.
member.exception: Thrown when the provided apiKey or apiHost are null.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.AbstractClient.GetUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Get the full URL for a given location.
member.param: The API location to be used.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.AbstractClient.GenerateResponse(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Deserialize the server response json and creates a object with its data.
member.param: The http status code returned by the server.
The json returned by the server.
member.exception: Thrown when an invalid json was received from the server.
Thrown when the server returns a non-success http status code.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.AbstractClient.ValidateServerResponse(TwizoAPI.Responses.Response)
member.summary: Validate the response from the server and throws appropriate exception if the call was not successful.
member.param: object created from the server response.
member.exception: Thrown when the server returns a non-success http status code.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.AbstractClient.SendRequest(System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Send a request to the Twizo server and return its response.
member.param: The API location to which to request should be sent.
The http verb to be used.
The parameters to be sent with the request (optional).
member.exception: Thrown when an invalid json was received from the server.
Thrown when the server returns a non-success http status code.
Thrown when the parameters could not be serialized.

Result types for sms and numberlookup.

member.name: T:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity
member.summary: Abstract parent class of all entity objects.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.ACTION_RETRIEVE
member.summary: Http verb GET, used to retrieve server data.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.ACTION_SUBMIT
member.summary: Http verb POST, used to submit server data.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.ACTION_REMOVE
member.summary: Http verb DELETE, used to remove server data.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.ACTION_UPDATE
member.summary: Http verb PUT, used to update server data.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.client
member.summary: object, used to send and receive data.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.parameters
member.summary: The parameters to be sent to the server.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.#ctor(TwizoAPI.AbstractClient)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the clas.
member.param: object, used to send and receive data.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.GetCreateUrl
member.summary: Get the location to which the server call should be made.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.AddParameter(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Add a parameter to be sent to the server.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.DetectInvalidJsonFields
member.summary: Detect invalid json fields in the entity and throws an exception when found.
member.exception: Thrown when the of this entity could not be serialized.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.SendApiCall(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Send an API call to the .
member.param: The http verb to be used with the API call.
The URL to which the API call should be made.
member.exception: Thrown when the of this entity could not be serialized.
Thrown when incorrect parameters were sent to the server.
Thrown when the server returns a non-success http status code or an invalid response.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.FillObject(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Fill the entity properties using the API response.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.GetItems(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Find the embedded items from an API response.
member.returns: If found, returns embedded items. Otherwise, returns

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.Populate(System.String)
member.summary: Get the entity status for the supplied message id.
member.param: The message id of the entity.
member.exception: Thrown when no message id was supplied.
Thrown when the server returns a non-success http status code or an invalid response.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.AbstractEntity.PropertyExists(System.String)
member.summary: Check if this entity contains a property with the given name.
member.returns: true if the property exists, otherwise false

Perform a lookup on one or more numbers.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.applicationTag
member.summary: Gets the application used for sending the verification.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.countryCode
member.summary: Gets the country code. A two-digit code of the country of the operator the number is subscribed to.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.createdDateTime
member.summary: Gets the datetime the numberlookup was received by the API. Datetime is in ISO-8601 format.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.imsi
member.summary: Gets the imsi (International Mobile Subscriber Identity) of the SIM card the number is linked to.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.isPorted
member.summary: Gets information on whether the number is ported to another operator than the operator who issued the number.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.isRoaming
member.summary: Gets information on whether the number is currently roaming.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.messageId
member.summary: Gets the message id, a unique id identifying this numberlookup.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.msc
member.summary: Gets the msc (Mobile Switching Center) of the operator the number is currently registered to.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.networkCode
member.summary: Gets the network code of the operator the number is subscribed to.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.Operator
member.summary: Gets the name of the operator the number is subscribed to.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.reasonCode
member.summary: Gets the reason code if the numberlookup was rejected or could not be performed.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.resultTimestamp
member.summary: Gets the timestamp when the numberlookup was performed.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.salesPrice
member.summary: Gets the sales price for this numberlookup.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.salesPriceCurrencyCode
member.summary: Gets the currency for the sale of this numberlookup.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.status
member.summary: Gets the status of this numberlookup.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.statusCode
member.summary: Gets the status code of this numberlookup.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.validUntilDateTime
member.summary: Gets the datetime until which this numberlookup is valid.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.NumberLookup.callbackUrl

member.summary: Gets the datetime the sms was received by the API. Datetime is in ISO-8601 format.

member.summary: Gets the message id, a unique id identifying this sms.

member.summary: Gets the network code of the operator the number is subscribed to.

member.summary: Gets the sales price for this sms.

member.summary: Gets the currency for the sale of this sms.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.Sms.status
member.summary: Gets the status of this sms.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.Sms.statusCode
member.summary: Gets the status code of this sms.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.Sms.type
member.summary: Gets the type of this sms. Either or .

member.summary: Gets the datetime until which this numberlookup is valid.

member.summary: Gets or sets the body of the sms.

member.summary: Gets or sets the callback url. If set, status updates will be submitted to this url

member.summary: Gets or sets the dcs, used to specify the character set of the body.

member.summary: Gets or sets the pid. Can be used to send hidden sms.

member.summary: Gets or sets the recipient. Single phone number in international format.

member.summary: Gets or sets recipients. Array of all the numbers this message was sent to.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.Sms.resultType
member.summary: Gets or sets the of the sms.

member.name: P:TwizoAPI.Entity.Sms.scheduledDelivery
member.summary: Gets or sets the datetime of scheduled delivery. Datetime must be in ISO-8601 format.

member.summary: Gets or sets the senderTon.

member.summary: Gets or sets the tag for this sms. Free text parameter you can use for your own reference.

Twizo error codes.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.ErrorCode.SERVER_UNAVAILABLE
member.summary: The server is unavailable.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.ErrorCode.INVALID_RESPONSE
member.summary: An invalid or unknown response was received from the server.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.ErrorCode.VALIDATION_ERRORS
member.summary: One or more errors occured while validating the supplied data.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.ErrorCode.VERIFICATION_FAILED
member.summary: The verification failed.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.ErrorCode.NO_CLIENT_FOUND
member.summary: No client was found.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.ErrorCode.INVALID_FIELDS
member.summary: One or more of the parameters supplied are invalid.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.ErrorCode.NO_MESSAGE_ID_SUPPLIED
member.summary: No message id was supplied.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.ErrorCode.INVALID_APPLICATION_SECRET
member.summary: The supplied api key is invalid.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.ErrorCode.UNDEFINED_FIELD_ACCESSED
member.summary: An undefined field was requested.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.ErrorCode.SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE
member.summary: The requested service is unavailable.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.ErrorCode.ENTITY_NOT_FOUND
member.summary: The requested entity was not found.

member.name: F:TwizoAPI.ErrorCode.BACKUP_CODE_FAILED
member.summary: The supplied backup code is invalid.

member.summary: Gets the of this exception.

Interface for Twizo.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.ITwizo.CreateVerification(System.String)
member.summary: Create a verification for the supplied recipient.
member.param: The number that should receive the token.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.ITwizo.GetVerification(System.String)
member.summary: Get the verification status for the supplied message id.
member.param: The message id of the verification.
member.returns: object with the supplied message id
member.exception: Thrown when no message id was supplied.
Thrown when the server returns a non-success http status code or an invalid response.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.ITwizo.GetTokenResult(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verify the supplied token and return the verification object when successfully verified; otherwise return an exception.
member.param: The message id of the verification.
member.returns: object with the supplied message id
member.exception: Thrown when the supplied token is empty or null.
Thrown when the message id is empty or null.
Thrown when the server returns a non-success http status code or an invalid response.
Thrown when the returned error code is a verification error.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.ITwizo.VerifyToken(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verify the supplied token; return true when successful and false when there is an error.
member.param: The message id of the verification.
member.returns: true if verification was succesful, otherwise false.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.ITwizo.CreateBackupCode(System.String)
member.summary: Create backup codes for the supplied identifier.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.ITwizo.GetBackupCode(System.String)
member.summary: Get the backup code status for the supplied identifier.
member.exception: Thrown when the supplied identifier is empty or null.
Thrown when the server returns a non-success http status code or an invalid response.

member.summary: Create an sms with the supplied body, recipients and sender.
member.param: Array with the recipients of the sms.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.ITwizo.GetSms(System.String)
member.summary: Get the sms status for the supplied message id.
member.param: The message id of the sms.
member.returns: object with the supplied message id.
member.exception: Thrown when no message id was supplied.
Thrown when the server returns a non-success http status code or an invalid response.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.ITwizo.GetSmsResults
member.summary: Get the sms polling results; returns results only for messages which have result type polling enabled.
member.exception: Thrown when the server returns a non-success http status code or an invalid response.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.ITwizo.CreateNumberLookup(System.String[])
member.summary: Create a number lookup for the supplied numbers.
member.param: Array with the numbers to be lookup up.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.ITwizo.GetNumberLookup(System.String)
member.summary: Get the number lookup status for the supplied message id.
member.param: The message id of the NumberLookup.
member.returns: object with the supplied message id.
member.exception: Thrown when no message id was supplied.
Thrown when the server returns a non-success http status code or an invalid response.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.ITwizo.GetNumberLookupResults
member.summary: Get the number lookup polling results; returns results only for messages which have result type polling enabled.
member.exception: Thrown when the server returns a non-success http status code or an invalid response.

member.summary: Create a widget session with the supplied allowed types, recipient and backup code identifier.

member.name: M:TwizoAPI.ITwizo.GetWidgetSession(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get the widget session status for the supplied session token.
member.exception: Thrown when the session token is empty or null.
Thrown when the recipient and backup code identifier are empty or null.
Thrown when the of this entity could not be serialized.
Thrown when incorrect parameters were sent to the server.
Thrown when the server returns a non-success http status code or an invalid response.

member.summary: Create a balance object and retrieve its data.
member.exception: Thrown when loading the balance data has failed.
